food.question: I am yellow, and monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like me!
💛 I am the color of the sun.
🍌 You peel me before you eat me.

food.question: I am round and juicy, often red. You take a big bite of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🔴 Snow White liked me!
🍏 I can be different colors.

food.question: I am long and orange. Bunnies love to munch on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 I am a bunny's favorite!
🥕 I grow in the ground.
🧡 I help you see in the dark!

food.question: I am white and cold, and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You keep me in the freezer.
🍨 I am a yummy dessert.
🥄 You can put sprinkles on top of me.

food.question: I am small and round, green, and grow in bunches. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow on a vine.
🟢 I can be green or purple.
🧺 You can eat many of me at once.

food.question: I am a drink that comes from cows. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 Baby cows drink me.
🥛 I am white.
🥣 You can pour me on your cereal.

food.question: I am made of dough and cooked in the oven. You can put toppings on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍕 I can be cut into slices.
🍅 I often have tomato sauce.
🔥 I am hot when I come out of the oven.

food.question: I am a yellow fruit with a bumpy skin and a crown on top. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I have a crown.
🍍 SpongeBob lives in one like me!
🌴 I grow in warm places.

food.question: I am crunchy, and salty, and come in a bag. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I'm often made from a potato.
😋 I'm a popular snack.
🍟 I'm similar to french fries, but flatter.

food.question: I am a brown seed that can be ground into a powder to make a yummy drink. What am I?

hints.text: ☕️ Grown ups like to drink me in the morning.
🍫 You can find me in chocolate!
🌱 I come from a plant.

plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Sometimes I have flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need water to grow.
☀️ Birds like to sit in me.
🌳 I am big and strong, or small and delicate.

plant.question: I'm red and round and grow on a plant. You can eat me! What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ I am often used to make sauce.
🍅 Some people put me in salads.
🪴 I grow from a flower.

plant.question: Bees like to visit me. I smell sweet and can be many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 I grow in the garden.
💐 I make people happy when they get me as a gift.
🌸 I come before fruits appear.

plant.question: I am long and green and crunchy. Rabbits like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I grow under the ground.
🥗 I am good to eat raw or cooked.
🐰 I make a good healthy snack.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and pretty flowers. Be careful when you touch me! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often red, but can be other colors too!
🥀 I am given to people as a sign of love.
🌵 I need lots of sun to grow.

plant.question: I am yellow and grow in a field. You can pop me and eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow tall.
🍿 I can be made into a tasty snack.
🐥 Farm animals like to eat me.

plant.question: I have a big trunk and lots of branches. Birds build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍁 I can lose my leaves in the fall.
🦉 I provide shade on a sunny day.
🪵 I can be used to make wood for building.

plant.question: I am green and leafy, and you can eat me in a salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a type of vegetable.
🥗 Some people put me in sandwiches.
🌱 I need plenty of water to stay crisp.

plant.question: I am a seed that grows into a tall plant. I give you healthy oil and snacks! What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 I can grow very tall and turn to face the sun.
🌾 Birds and squirrels like to eat my seeds.
☀️ My oil can be used for cooking.

plant.question: I am a very tall tree. Some animals make their home inside me. What kind of tree am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
🐿️ Squirrels like to eat my cones.
🎁 People use me as a holiday tree.
